name: Cabela's Outdoor Adventures (2005)
description: Each excursion is led by Cabela's Outdoor Adventures group and hunting guide. New enhancements for 2006 include a Mini-Map that allows you to sense and see where the game is hiding; Lock-On, which secures your aim over a target for a sure kill in easy mode; Steady Aim, featuring a finer control over your aim - mimicking the calm a hunter must achieve before squeezing the trigger; Sprint mode to get into position to take your best shot; angling for bass in pristine streams while territorial bears protect their fishing spots. With over 1- species of deer, 22 big and small game animals and 11 fish species, Outdoor Adventures is sure to be a hit with all outdoor sportsmen.
